00043 void BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::encode(uint8_t **bufp) {
00044   uint8_t *base = *bufp;
00045   BlockCompressionHeader::encode(bufp);
00046   encode_i64(bufp, m_revision);
00047   if ((size_t)(*bufp - base) + 2 == length())
00048     write_header_checksum(base, bufp);
00049 }

00052 void BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::decode(const uint8_t **bufp,
00053                                              size_t *remainp) {
00054   const uint8_t *base = *bufp;
00055 
00056   BlockCompressionHeader::decode(bufp, remainp);
00057   m_revision = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00058 
00059   if ((size_t)(*bufp - base) == length() - 2) {
00060     *bufp += 2;
00061     *remainp -= 2;
00062   }
00063 }
